definitions.text: lacking or indicating lack of confidence or assurance
examples: unsure of himself and his future
touched the ornaments with uncertain fingers

definitions.text: not established beyond doubt; still undecided or unknown
examples: changes of great if uncertain consequences
without further evidence his story must remain uncertain
his doom is as yet unsealed

definitions.text: not certain to occur; not inevitable
examples: everything is uncertain about the army
unsettled weather with rain and hail and sunshine coming one right after the other
a gun with a rather uncertain trigger
she spoke in no uncertain terms
